VOTE_DESCRIPTION: Use this command to Vote for Sofi on Top.GG. Every Vote you contribute to Sofi will reward you with a Wist. Once you have accumulated 30 and 50 Votes respectively in a month, you will be awarded a chest which can contain an exclusive Frame
USE_WIST: You will obtain a **Wist** <:wist:870339503427027005> for each successful **Vote**!
EMBED_FOOTER: You get double the amount of Wists on a weekend
